meanings.definition: A group of extinct plants with jointed stems and small leaves.
meanings.sent1: The sphenopsids were ancient plants with segmented stems.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fossils of sphenopsids to learn about prehistoric flora.
meanings.sent3: The sphenopsids must have had fun dancing in the wind with their tiny leaves.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the sphenopsids stood tall like soldiers with their jointed stems.
meanings.sent5: The sphenopsids, with their segmented stems, looked like miniature bamboo trees.

meanings.definition: Plants belonging to the class Sphenopsida, characterized by jointed stems and small leaves.
meanings.sent1: We learned about sphenopsids in our botany class.
meanings.sent2: The sphenopsids in the greenhouse had delicate leaves and sturdy stems.
meanings.sent3: The sphenopsids in the park seemed to gossip with their tiny leaves.
meanings.sent4: The sphenopsids in the forest stood out like green torches with their segmented stems.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the sphenopsids as little green aliens with jointed stems exploring the garden.
